$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/actions/add-boil.title: $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/actions/add-boilerplate
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/actions/add-boil.caption: add boilerplate tiddlers
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/actions/add-boil.text:
\define plugin-tiddler-within(title) $(namePrefix)$$(__publisher__)$/$(__plugin-name__)$/$title$

<$set name="old-list" tiddler=<<plugin-full-path>> field="list">
<$set name="list" filter="[enlist<old-list>] -[[readme]] -[[license]] -[[history]]">
<$set name="new-list" filter="readme license history [enlist<list>]">
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" >{{!!caption}}
<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" title=<<plugin-tiddler-within "history">> $param="$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/templates/boilerplate/history" />
<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" title=<<plugin-tiddler-within "license">> $param="$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/templates/boilerplate/license" />
<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" title=<<plugin-tiddler-within "readme">> $param="$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/templates/boilerplate/readme" />
<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<plugin-full-path>> list=<<new-list>> />
</$button>
</$set>
</$set>
</$set>

$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/actions/add-icon.title: $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/actions/add-icon
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/actions/add-icon.caption: add plugin icon
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/actions/add-icon.text:
\import $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/macros/create-item

<!-- create the icon tiddler, if exist navigate to it -->
<$vars iconTemplate="$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/templates/icon" iconTiddlerTitle={{{ [<plugin-full-path>addsuffix[/icon]] }}}>
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{!!caption}}
<$list filter="[<iconTiddlerTitle>is[missing]]" emptyMessage='<$action-navigate $to=<<iconTiddlerTitle>>/>' variable=ignore>
<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" $param=<<iconTemplate>> title=<<iconTiddlerTitle>> />
</$list>
</$button>
</$vars>

$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/actions/add-plug.title: $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/actions/add-plugin.info
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/actions/add-plug.text:
\define plugin-tiddler-within(title) $(namePrefix)$$(publisherName)$/$(pluginName)$/$title$
\define plugin-title() $:/plugins/$(publisherName)$/$(pluginName)$

\define addInfo-actions()
<$action-setfield $index="title" $value=<<plugin-title>>    />
<$action-setfield $index="name"  $value={{{ [<plugin-title>get[name]] }}}   />
<$action-setfield $index="description" $value={{{ [<plugin-title>get[description]] }}}    />
<$action-setfield $index="author" $value={{{ [<plugin-title>get[author]] }}}    />
<$action-setfield $index="version" $value={{{[<plugin-title>get[version]]}}}    />
<$action-setfield $index="core-version" $value={{{[<plugin-title>get[core-version]] ~[<version>]}}}    />
<$action-setfield $index="source" $value={{{[<plugin-title>get[source]]}}}    />
<$action-setfield $index="list" $value={{{[<plugin-title>get[list]]}}}    />
<$action-setfield $index="parent-plugin" $value={{{[<plugin-title>get[parent-plugin]]}}}    />
<$action-setfield $index="dependents" $value={{{[<plugin-title>get[dependents]]}}}    />
<$action-setfield $index="plugin-type" $value={{{[<plugin-title>get[plugin-draft]]}}}    />
<$action-setfield $index="packaged-by" $value=<<now "Gatha on DDth MMM YYYY, 0hh:0mm:0ss">> />
<$action-navigate $to=<<currentTiddler>>/>
\end


<$button class="tc-btn-invisible">{{!!caption}}
<$tiddler tiddler=<<plugin-tiddler-within "plugin.info">> >
<<addInfo-actions>>
</$tiddler>
</$button>
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/actions/add-plug.caption: add plugin.info (for node.js)

$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/download-.title: $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/download-empty
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/download-.text:
\define saveTiddlerFilter()
[[$:/core]] [[$:/isEncrypted]] [[$:/themes/tiddlywiki/snowwhite]] [[$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla]] -[[$:/boot/boot.css]] -[type[application/javascript]library[yes]] -[[$:/boot/boot.js]] -[[$:/boot/bootprefix.js]] [subfilter{$:/config/gatha/PublishFilter}] [subfilter{$:/config/$(publisherName)$/$(pluginName)$/PublishFilter}] +[sort[title]]
\end

\define savingEmpty()
yes
\end

`<script class="tiddlywiki-tiddler-store" type="application/json">[`
<!--- JSON for plugin tiddler here -->
{{||$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/json-template}}
`]</script>`
{{$:/core/templates/tiddlywiki5.html}}

$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/export-bt.title: $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/export-btn-plugin-backup
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/export-bt.caption: plugin source backup
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/export-bt.text: \define plugin-exported-backup-json-filename() backup_$(pluginType)$_$(publisherName)$_$(pluginName)$_v$(pluginVersion)$_$(timedate)$.json \define export-plugin-source() <$set name=exportFilter filter="[prefix] [enlist{!!extra-tiddlers}] [enlist{!!resource-tiddlers}] [[$:/config/$(publisherName)$/$(pluginName)$/PublishFilter]has[title]]"> <$button class="" dragFilter=<> class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="export plugin source as a json file"> {{$:/core/images/export-button}}plugin source (backup json file) <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-download-file" $param="$:/core/templates/exporters/JsonFile" exportFilter=<> filename=<> /> \end <>

$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/export-bt.title: $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/export-btn-plugin-demo
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/export-bt.caption: export plugin+empty.jtml
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/export-bt.text: \define plugin-exported-demo-filename() demo_$(publisherName)$_$(pluginName)$_v$(pluginVersion)$_$(timedate)$.html \define publishFilter() <$button message="tm-edit-tiddler" param="$:/config/$(publisherName)$/$(pluginName)$/PublishFilter" class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="edit plugin plublish filter">... \end \define export-demo-html() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="export plugin in a working demo wiki"> {{$:/core/images/globe}}plugin demo (demo.html) <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-download-file" $param="$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/download-empty" filename=<> currentTiddler=<> publisherName=<> pluginName=<> />   <> \end <>

$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/export-bt.title: $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/export-btn-plugin-packaged
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/export-bt.caption: export json file
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/export-bt.text: \define plugin-exported-json-filename() $(pluginType)$_$(publisherName)$_$(pluginName)$_v$(pluginVersion)$_$(timedate)$.json \define export-packaged-plugin() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="export plugin as a packed json file"> {{$:/core/images/list}}packaged plugin (json file) <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-download-file" $param="$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/json-template" pluginType=<> currentTiddler=<> filename=<> /> \end <>

$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/export-bt.title: $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/export-btn-plugin-zipped
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/export-bt.caption: export zip file
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/export-bt.text: \whitespace trim \define plugin-exported-zip-filename() $(pluginType)$_$(publisherName)$_$(pluginName)$_v$(pluginVersion)$_$(timedate)$.zip \define tempZipTiddler() $:/temp/gatha/_ZipTiddler \define delete-temp-action() <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> /> \define renderContent() <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-zip-create" $param=<>/> <$list filter="[prefix] -[] -[[$(currentTiddler)$/plugin.info]]" > <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-zip-render-file" $param=<> filename={{{ [split[/]butfirst[2]slugify[]join[/]addsuffix[.tid]] }}} tiddler=<> template="$:/core/templates/tid-tiddler" /> <$list filter="[[$(currentTiddler)$/plugin.info]has[title]]" variable=plugininfoTiddler> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-zip-add-text-file" $param=<> filename={{{[[plugin.info]addprefix[$(publisherName)$/$(pluginName)$/]]}}} text={{{ [get[text]] }}} /> <$list filter="[enlist{!!extra-tiddlers}] :filter[has[title]]" > <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-zip-render-file" $param=<> filename={{{ [search-replace:g[$:],[system]] +[split[/]slugify[]join[/]addsuffix[.tid]addprefix[$(publisherName)$/$(pluginName)$/extra/]] }}} tiddler=<> template="$:/core/templates/tid-tiddler" /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-zip-download" $param=<> filename=<> /> \end \define export-zipped-plugin() <$button actions=<> class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="export plugin folder to be used with Tiddlywiki on Node.js"> {{$:/core/images/storyview-classic}}plugin folder (zip file) <> \end <>

$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/json-temp.title: $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/json-template
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/json-temp.text:
\define plugin-shadow-tiddlers()
{"tiddlers": {<$list filter="[subfilter<exportFilter>]+[bl[]]">
"{{{ [<currentTiddler>] +[jsonstringify[]] }}}": <$text text=<<jsontiddler>>/>,
</$list><$list filter="[subfilter<exportFilter>]+[last[]]">
"{{{ [<currentTiddler>] +[jsonstringify[]] }}}": <$text text=<<jsontiddler>>/></$list>}
}
\end

<$set name=exportFilter filter="[prefix<currentTiddler>] -[<currentTiddler>] [enlist{!!extra-tiddlers}] :filter[has[title]]">
<$wikify name=pluginShadows text=<<plugin-shadow-tiddlers>> >
<$jsontiddler tiddler=<<currentTiddler>> 
 $plugin-type={{!!plugin-draft}}
 $packaged-by=<<now "Gatha on DDth MMM YYYY, 0hh:0mm:0ss">>
 $text=<<pluginShadows>>
 exclude="plugin-draft extra-tiddlers resource-tiddlers"
 escapeUnsafeScriptChars="yes" />
</$wikify>
</$set>

$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/extra-tidd.title: $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/extra-tiddlers
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/extra-tidd.text:
\whitespace trim \import $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/macros/definition \define clear-all() <$list filter="[list[!!extra-tiddlers]count[]!match[0]]" variable="null" emptyMessage=" drop tiddlers here"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini" tooltip="remove all extra tiddlers" >remove all <$action-confirm $message="Do you wish to remove all extra tiddlers?"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field="extra-tiddlers" $value=""/> \end \define remove-tiddler-from-list() <$button tooltip="remove tiddler" aria-label="remove tiddler" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini tc-small-gap-right" actions="""<$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="extra-tiddlers" $subfilter="-[]"/>""" > {{$:/core/images/close-button}} <$link to={{!!title}}><$view field="title"/> \end \define drop-actions() <$list filter="[!prefix] :filter[has[title]]" variable=null> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="extra-tiddlers" $subfilter="+[insertbefore:currentTiddler]"/> \end \define placeholder()
\end \define droppable-item(button) \whitespace trim <$droppable actions=<> enable=<>> <>
$button$
\end \define add-bulk-tiddler() <$button to=<> class="tc-btn-invisible ga-extra-button" tooltip="add bulk of tiddlers"> {{$:/core/images/clone-button}} <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field="target-plugin" $value=<> /> \end
<$list filter="[getindex[add-tiddlers]match[show]]" variable=null><>   Extra tiddlers  (<$count filter="[enlist{!!extra-tiddlers}]" />)
<$vars gv-extra-list=<> > <$list filter="[list[!!extra-tiddlers]]" storyview="pop">
<$macrocall $name="droppable-item" button=<> />
<$macrocall $name="droppable-item" button=<> />

$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/resource-t.title: $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/resource-tiddlers
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/resource-t.text:
\whitespace trim \import $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/macros/definition \define clear-all() <$list filter="[list[!!resource-tiddlers]count[]!match[0]]" variable="null" emptyMessage=" drop tiddlers here"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini" tooltip="remove all extra tiddlers" >remove all <$action-confirm $message="Do you wish to remove all resource tiddlers?"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field="resource-tiddlers" $value=""/> \end \define remove-tiddler-from-list() <$button tooltip="remove tiddler" aria-label="remove tiddler" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini tc-small-gap-right" actions="""<$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="resource-tiddlers" $subfilter="-[]"/>""" > {{$:/core/images/close-button}} <$link to={{!!title}}><$view field="title"/> \end \define drop-actions() <$list filter="[!prefix] :filter[has[title]]" variable=null> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="resource-tiddlers" $subfilter="+[insertbefore:currentTiddler]"/> \end \define placeholder()
\end \define droppable-item(button) \whitespace trim <$droppable actions=<> enable=<>> <>
$button$
\end \define add-bulk-tiddler() <$button to=<> class="tc-btn-invisible ga-extra-button" tooltip="add bulk of tiddlers"> {{$:/core/images/clone-button}} <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field="target-plugin" $value=<> /> \end <$list filter="[getindex[res-tiddlers]match[show]]" variable=null>
Resource tiddlers  (<$count filter="[enlist{!!resource-tiddlers}]" />)
<$vars gv-extra-list=<> > <$list filter="[list[!!resource-tiddlers]]" storyview="pop">
<$macrocall $name="droppable-item" button=<> />
<$macrocall $name="droppable-item" button=<> />

$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/search-by-.title: $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/search-by-filter
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/search-by-.caption: Filter search
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/search-by-.text:
\import $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/search-inputbox

\define btn-actions()
<$action-listops $tiddler={{!!target-plugin}} 
  $field={{{[<modifier>match[ctrl]then[resource-tiddlers]else[extra-tiddlers]]}}} 
  $subfilter={{{ [<tempTid>get[text]] }}} 
/>
\end

\define add-by-filter-Button()
<$list filter="[subfilter{$(tempTid)$}] :filter[has[title]]  +[limit[1]]" variable=null>
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="add bulk of tiddlers to target plugin" actions=<<btn-actions>> >
{{$:/core/images/clone-button}}
</$button>
</$list>
\end


Target plugin: {{!!target-plugin}}

<$macrocall $name="add-bulk-extra-tiddlers" label="Search by filter" placeholder="enter a filter e.g [tag[doc]]" addbutton=<<add-by-filter-Button>> /> 

<!-- show results -->
<$vars resultFilter={{{ [<tempTid>get[text]] }}} >
<small>//<$count filter="[subfilter<resultFilter>] :filter[has[title]]" /> matches//</small>

<$list filter="[subfilter<resultFilter>] :filter[has[title]]" template="$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate"/>
</$vars>

$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/search-by-.title: $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/search-by-hierarchy
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/search-by-.caption: Hierarchical search
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/search-by-.text:
\import $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/macros/definition \import $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/search-inputbox \define toc-list(here,max,exclude,level:"1") <$list filter="""[tag[$here$]] $exclude$ -[[$here$]]"""> <$text text={{{ [format:titlelist[]] }}}/>
<$reveal default="$level$" type="nomatch" text="$max$"> <$macrocall $name="toc-list" here=<> max="$max$" exclude="""$exclude$ -[[$here$]]""" level={{{ [[$level$]add[1]] }}}/> \end \define btn-actions() <$action-listops $tiddler={{!!target-plugin}} $field={{{[match[ctrl]then[resource-tiddlers]else[extra-tiddlers]]}}} $subfilter="[enlist]" /> \end \define add-by-hierarchy-Button() <$wikify name=allTiddlers text="""<$macrocall $name=toc-list here={{{ [get[text]trim[]!search:title!search:title] }}}/>""" > <$list filter="[enlisthas[title]limit[1]]" variable=null> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="add bulk of tiddlers to target plugin" actions=<> > {{$:/core/images/clone-button}} \end \define display-results() <$button class="ga-toggle-result tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="toggle display results"> {{$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/images/toggle}} <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $index="hierarchical-result" $subfilter="+[toggle[toc-style]]" /> <$reveal default="" text="toc-style" type=nomatch stateTitle=<> stateIndex="hierarchical-result"> <$list filter="[enlist] :filter[has[title]]" template="$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate"/> <$reveal default="" text="toc-style" type=match stateTitle=<> stateIndex="hierarchical-result">
<$macrocall $name=toc tag={{{ [get[text]trim[]!search:title!search:title] }}} />
\end Target plugin: {{!!target-plugin}} <$vars lb="[" rb="]"> <$macrocall $name="add-bulk-extra-tiddlers" label="Root tag" placeholder="enter a root tag e.g Contents" addbutton=<> /> <$wikify name=allTiddlers text="""<$macrocall $name=toc-list here={{{ [get[text]trim[]!search:title!search:title] }}}/>""" > //<$count filter="[enlist] :filter[has[title]]" /> matches// <>

$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/search-inp.title: $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/search-inputbox
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/search-inp.text:
\define tempTid() $:/temp/gatha/add-bulk \define clear-action() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field="text" $value=""/> \end \define clearButton() <$list filter="[get[text]trim[]!is[blank]]" variable=null> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" actions=<> >{{$:/core/images/close-button}} \end \define add-bulk-extra-tiddlers(label, placeholder:"", addbutton)
<$keyboard actions=<> key="escape"> $label$: <$edit-text tiddler=<> tag=input default="" placeholder="$placeholder$" focus={{$:/config/Search/AutoFocus}}/> <> $addbutton$
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/history.title: $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/history
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/history.text:
Full change log  https://kookma.github.io/TW-Gatha/#ChangeLog

* ''1.0.0'' -- 2022.02.25 -- stable release
* ''0.9.5'' -- 2022.02.19 -- stable release candidate
* ''0.8.1'' -- 2022.02.11 -- ui for add extra tiddlers
* ''0.1.0'' -- 2019.01.12 -- first beta release

$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/import/load-plug.title: $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/import/load-plugin
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/import/load-plug.text:
\define loadTid() $:/temp/gatha/load \define excluded-plugins() $:/temp/info-plugin $:/core $:/plugins/kookma/gatha \define load-actions() <$tiddler tiddler={{{ [get[text]] }}} > <$action-confirm $message="Do you wish to load selected plugin into Gatha and convert it to a draft? This action cannot be undone!"> <$list filter="[all[current]!has[plugin-draft]]"> <$action-setfield $field="plugin-draft" $value={{!!plugin-type}} /> <$set name=shadows filter="[all[current]plugintiddlers[]!prefix]"> <$action-setfield $field="extra-tiddlers" $value=<> /> <$list filter="[all[current]plugintiddlers[]]"> <$action-setfield $field=modified $value=<> /> <$action-deletefield text plugin-type/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-notify" $param="$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/import/notify-template" currentPlugin=<> /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/temp/popup/gatha/select-plugin"/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> /> \end \define select-to-load() <$set name=plugins filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]plugin-type[plugin]sort[name]] -[enlist]" > Select plugin to modify <$select tiddler=<> default={{{ [enlistfirst[]] }}} > <$list filter="[enlist]"> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]plugin-type[theme]sort[name]]"> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]plugin-type[language]sort[name]]"> \end \define load-plugin-ui() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" popup="$:/temp/popup/gatha/select-plugin" tooltip="load exisiting plugins to modify">{{$:/core/images/edit-button}}load plugin <$reveal type="popup" state="$:/temp/popup/gatha/select-plugin" class="tc-popup-keep">
<> <$list filter="[get[text]]" variable=selected-plugin > <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" style="margin:5px 0; padding:0;" actions=<> disabled=<> > {{$:/core/images/edit-button}} Load <$text text=<> />
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/import/notify-te.title: $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/import/notify-template
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/import/notify-te.text:
The <<currentPlugin>> has been loaded into ''Gatha''.

Please save and reload.

$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/macros/create-it.title: $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/macros/create-item
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/macros/create-it.text:
\whitespace trim

\define create-item(btnCaption:"new item", type, tidTitle, template, fields)
<$set name="newTitle" 
   filter="[<__type__>!is[blank]]" 
   value={{{[<plugin-full-path>addsuffix[/$type$]addsuffix[/$tidTitle$]]}}} 
   emptyValue={{{[<plugin-full-path>addsuffix[/$tidTitle$]]}}} 
>
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" > $btnCaption$
<$macrocall $name=unique-title baseTitle=<<newTitle>> template=<<__template__>> fields=<<__fields__>> />
</$button>
</$set>
\end

\define unique-title(baseTitle:"New Tiddler", template, fields:"" n:0)
<$set name="inc" value={{{ [<__n__>add[1]addprefix[0000]split[]last[3]join[]] }}}>
<$set name="newTitle" value={{{[<__baseTitle__>addsuffix<inc>]}}}>
<$list filter="[<newTitle>] +[!has[title]]" 
emptyMessage=""" <$macrocall $name="unique-title" baseTitle=<<__baseTitle__>> template=<<__template__>> fields=<<__fields__>> n=<<inc>> /> """>
<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" $param=<<__template__>> title=<<newTitle>> $fields$/>
</$list>
</$set>
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/macros/create-pl.title: $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/macros/create-plugin
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/macros/create-pl.text: \define create-new-plugin() <$button tooltip="create new plugin" class="tc-btn-invisible" > {{$:/core/images/new-button}}new plugin <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" title="$:/plugins/PublisherName/PluginName" plugin-draft="plugin" type="application/json"/> \end

$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/macros/definitio.title: $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/macros/definition
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/macros/definitio.text:
\define tidConfig() $:/config/gatha/UIElements
\define tid-addExtraTiddlers-ui() Gatha Add Bulk of Extra Tiddlers

$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/macros/pluginAct.title: $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/macros/pluginActions
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/macros/pluginAct.text:
\whitespace trim \define plugin-full-path() $:/plugins/$(publisher)$/$(plugin-name)$ \define plugin-full-path-slash() $:/plugins/$(publisher)$/$(plugin-name)$/ \define plugin-contents-filter() [prefixaddsuffix[/]!is[shadow]sort[]] \define list-plugins(pluginName, publisherName) <$vars plugin-name=<<__pluginName__>> publisher=<<__publisherName__>> > <$set name="qp" value={{{[addsuffix[/$(currentTiddler)$/popup-state]]>}}} > <$button popup=<> class=<> selectedClass="tc-selected"> {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="below" animate="yes">
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/tehran/action]!has[draft.of]sort[caption]]"> <$transclude mode="inline"/>
  <$link to=<>> <$macrocall $name="plugin-name" $output="text/plain" />  (<$count filter=<> />)
<$macrocall $name="tree-node" prefix=<> />
\end \define tehran() <$list filter="[tag[newPlugin]prefix[$:/plugins/]] -[all[shadows]prefix[$:/plugins/]shadowsource[]removeprefix[$:/plugins/]]" variable="newPlugin"> <$vars pluginName= {{{[removeprefix[$:/plugins/]split[/]last[1]]}}} publisherName={{{[removeprefix[$:/plugins/]split[/]first[1]]}}} > <$macrocall $name=list-plugins pluginName=<> publisherName=<> /> \end

$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/plugin-types/lan.title: $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/plugin-types/language
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/plugin-types/lan.caption: Language
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/plugin-types/lan.text: `language` -- this plugin is a language package for the language "{{!!name}}". This language plugin will automatically be used when you select this language in the [[basic settings|$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Basics]] of the [[control panel|$:/ControlPanel]].

$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/plugin-types/plu.title: $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/plugin-types/plugin
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/plugin-types/plu.caption: Plugin
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/plugin-types/plu.text:
\rules except wikilink
`plugin` -- this is the most general form of a TiddlyWiki 5 plugin.

$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/plugin-types/the.title: $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/plugin-types/theme
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/plugin-types/the.caption: Theme
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/plugin-types/the.text:
\rules except wikilink
`theme` -- contains a TiddlyWiki 5 theme.
You can select this theme through the [[theme switcher|$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Theme]] in the [[control pane|$:/ControlPanel]].

$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/readme.title: $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/readme
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/readme.text:
; Gatha Studio Workspace
Create Tiddlywiki plugins, themes, languages, editions, contents in browser in an easy way and distribute as packaged JSON file, Node.JS plugin folder, or a Tiddlywiki app.

;Code and demo
For learning plugin features, syntax, tutorial and examples see the plugin demo and code pages

* Demo: https://kookma.github.io/TW-Gatha/
* Code: https://github.com/kookma/TW-Gatha

$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/tabs/content-tem.text:
\whitespace trim \define plugin-full-path() $(namePrefix)$$(publisherName)$/$(pluginName)$ \define disp-export-buttons()
''Export plugin''
<$list filter="[prefix] -[] [enlist{!!extra-tiddlers}] :filter[has[title]] +[limit[1]]" variable=null emptyMessage="There is nothing to export!"> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/Gatha/ExportButton]!has[draft.of]sort[caption]]" variable=button>
<$transclude tiddler=<
\end \define disp-plugin-tree(plugin-name, publisher) <$set name="qp" value={{{ [addprefix[$:/state/popup/actions/]] >}}} > <$button popup=<> class="tc-btn-invisible" selectedClass="tc-selected"> {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="below" animate="yes">
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/Gatha/Action]!has[draft.of]sort[caption]]"> <$transclude mode="inline"/>
<$link to=<> />  (<$count filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]prefix] -[]" />)
<$macrocall $name="tree-node" prefix={{{ [addsuffix[/]] }}} />
\end <$tiddler tiddler=<>> <$let pluginType = {{!!plugin-draft}} namePrefix = {{{ [addprefix[$:/]addsuffix[s/]] }}} pluginName = {{{ [removeprefixsplit[/]last[1]] }}} publisherName = {{{ [removeprefixsplit[/]first[1]] }}} pluginVersion = {{{ [get[version]else[0.0.0]] }}} timedate = <> > <$macrocall $name=disp-plugin-tree plugin-name=<> publisher=<> /> {{||$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/extra-tiddlers}} {{||$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/extra/resource-tiddlers}} <$macrocall $name=disp-export-buttons />

$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/ui/ControlPanel/.title: $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/ui/ControlPanel/Settings
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/ui/ControlPanel/.caption: Gatha
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/ui/ControlPanel/.text:
\import $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/macros/definition \define tidToggleVisibility() $:/temp/gatha/fields-visibility \define hiddenFields() author core-version description extra-tiddlers name plugin-priority plugin-type parent-plugin plugin-draft resource-tiddlers source version \define toggle-plugin-fields-visibility() <$vars status={{{[get[text]] :map[match[hide]then[show]] :else[[hide]] }}} > <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="hide/show plugin fields in edit mode"> {{$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/images/toggle}}toggle fileds visibility <$list filter="[enlistaddprefix[$:/config/EditTemplateFields/Visibility/]]"> <$action-setfield $field=text $value=<> /> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="text" $subfilter="+[toggle[hide]]" /> \end
These settings let you customise the behaviour of Gatha plugin. --- ;Show Gatha setting in more sidebar :<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/ui/ControlPanel/Settings" tag="$:/tags/MoreSideBar"> Show setting in more sidebar ; Hide Gatha in sidebar :<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/ui/sidebar" tag="$:/tags/SideBar"> Disable Gatha development interface
Hide plugin fields
<>
<$list filter="[enlistaddprefix[$:/config/EditTemplateFields/Visibility/]]">
<$checkbox tiddler=<> field=text checked="hide" unchecked="show" default="show"> <$link/>
;Global publish filter ($:/config/gatha/PublishFilter) :<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/gatha/PublishFilter" field=text class="ga-edit-publish"/> ;Advanced ptions :<$checkbox tiddler=<> index="load-plugin" checked="show" unchecked="hide" default="hide"> Show load-plugin button :<$checkbox tiddler=<> index="add-tiddlers" checked="show" unchecked="hide" default="hide"> Show add extra tiddlers button :<$checkbox tiddler=<> index="res-tiddlers" checked="show" unchecked="hide" default="hide"> Show resource tiddlers section

$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/ui/edit-template.title: $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/ui/edit-template-plugin-meta-data
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/ui/edit-template.text:
\define plugin-info-row(name, value, output:"html") \rules except wikilink $name$: $value$ \end \define plugin-edit-row(name, field, placeholder) $name$: <$edit-text field="$field$" placeholder="$placeholder$"/> \end \define update-draft-title-action() <$vars old-draft-title={{{ [all[current]get[draft.title]split[/]butfirst[2]] +[join[/]] }}} > <$action-setfield $field="draft.title" $value={{{ [{!!plugin-draft}addprefix[$:/]addsuffix[s/]addsuffix] }}} /> \end \define plugin-edit-row-plugintype(name, field, placeholder) $name$: <$edit-text field="$field$" placeholder="$placeholder$" class="ga-plugin-edit-element-type"/>  <$select field="$field$" default="plugin" actions=<> > <$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/Gatha/PluginType]] :filter[has[caption]get[caption]!match[Undefined]]"> \end <$list filter="[all[current]has:field[plugin-draft]]">
<$set name="publisher" filter="[all[current]get[draft.title]split[/]nth[3]]"> <> <$set name="plugin-name" filter="[all[current]get[draft.title]split[/]nth[4]]"> <> <> <> <> <> <> <> <> <> <> <=5.1.23">>

$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/ui/view-template.title: $:/plugins/kookma/gatha/ui/view-template-plugin-meta-data
$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/ui/view-template.text:
\define plugin-type-infotiddler(tiddler) <$transclude tiddler="$tiddler$"> <$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/plugin-types/undefined"/> \end \define plugin-type-info(type) <$macrocall $name="plugin-type-infotiddler" tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/plugin-types/$type$"/> \end \define plugin-info-row(name, value) \rules except wikilink $name$: $value$ \end \define plugin-info-field-unspecified() unspecified \end \define plugin-info-field(name, field) <<$macrocall $name='plugin-info-field-unspecified' />">> \end \define plugin-info-field-plugin-type-int(name, type) <$set name="desc" value=<> > <$macrocall $name="plugin-info-row" name="$name$" value=<> /> \end \define plugin-info-field-plugin-type(name) <$macrocall $name="plugin-info-field-plugin-type-int" name="$name$" type={{!!plugin-draft}} /> \end \define plugin-info-field-link(name, field) <$list filter="[all[current]!field:$field$[]]" emptyMessage="""<" >>"""> <$macrocall $name="plugin-info-row" name="$name$" value={{!!$field$}} /> \end \define plugin-info-filter(name, filter) <$list filter="$filter$" emptyMessage="""<" >>"""> <$macrocall $name="plugin-info-row" name="$name$" value={{!!title}} /> \end \define update-plugin-info(name) $name$: <$importvariables filter="[[$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/actions/add-plugin.info]]"> <$vars plugin-title=<> currentTiddler={{{ [addsuffix[/plugin.info]] }}} > <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" tooltip="create and update plugin.info"> update <> \end <$list filter="[all[current]has:field[plugin-draft]]"> {{||$:/core/ui/Components/plugin-info}}
<> <> <> <$macrocall $name="plugin-info-field-plugin-type" name="Plugin type" /> <> <> <> <> <$macrocall $name="plugin-info-field-link" name="Source" field="source" /> <> <> <> <> <>
